messages.messageBody:
Joy,
I love the creative writing reference regarding the record keeping! When I
submit my quarterly reports, I need a couple of hours of quiet to fashion
those works of fiction in school-ese!
Bridget
Mama to Tim,13, Chistian, 7, Jeremiah, 5, and Emmanuelle, 17 months

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Intro and gas out
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I m Joy, unschooling mom to a 13yos and 11yod.  We ve been homeschooling for 7 years and have had our share of different curriculum and methods. I ve
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,
I'm Joy, unschooling mom to a 13yos and 11yod. We've been homeschooling
for 7 years and have had our share of different curriculum and methods.
I've been moving towards unschooling for several years basically to keep
the kids (and myself) from being bored to tears with texts and workbooks
(guess it's not our thing). I live in Missouri and have to keep a
running tab of what we do and how many hours we do it. Atleast we get
in some creative writing while making out our daily logs. :-)

About the gas out...
I don't know if this has been covered and I'm certainly not trying to
start a ruckus but for some interesting reading on why the gas out might
*not* work you might want to try:

http://www.stretcher.com/stories/00/000313n.cfm

Take care,
Joy
